This is the kind of corporate greed that is destroying the social fabric of America. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/sears-tells-retirees-to-pay-for-their-own-life-insurance/

The number of college freshmen that plan to major in education is near its lowest point in 45 years and if we don’t turn this around, future generations will be affected. We cannot continue to give teachers substandard wages.

Paying our teachers their worth isn’t just a good strategy to improve education — it’s central to building an economy that works for working people. Research shows that attracting and retaining more great teachers would improve student performance and increase graduation rates. https://twitter.com/TIME/status/1110592265272082433 QT @TIME Kamala Harris unveiled a $315 billion plan to give public school teachers across the country an average $13,500 raise http://time.com/5558852/kamal-harris-teacher-pay-raise-plan/?utm_campaign=time&utm_medium=socialflowtw&utm_source=twitter.com&xid=time_socialflow_twitter

Nearly one of every five teachers in America leaves teaching within five years of entering the classroom. That impacts our children, it impacts our school districts, and it’s time teachers got the support they deserve. My plan would raise teacher's pay an average of $13,500.

Today would have been Cesar Chavez's 92nd birthday. We've introduced a resolution in the Senate to honor his legacy of lifting up every voice, fighting for fair working conditions & securing basic dignity for all. #CesarChavezDay
